channel.title: Hiring a good coder
channel.description:
I know on the tutorial section theres a tutorial that consists of disallowing over 1 connection per ip, I've tried it, and my result started with:
People couldn't even connect
Then,
Nothing changed.
I'm hiring anyone to do it, if it works successfully without any errors/bugs. I will happily pay 3 USD off of paypal, for more information add me at msn
*

item.title: Hiring a good coder
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

requesting a programmer is not allowed, just do it yourself

if you need help with something, post a help topic with your problem

Read full topic
